channel.title: Donator Item
channel.description: In my Donator Shop, there are 4-6 items that I want to change their Donator Points for.. I searched for the Item Code everywhere in my source and I can't find it.. This is Delta

item.title: Donator Item
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Make an SQL database table, use a Java SQL connector just as you would with connecting the login server with a forums, for instance…vBulletin.

Make a new rights rank such as 4 or 5, which isn’t very hard to do, find a tutorial. Now with make a sub file (handler) with your connector and name it “donators.java”, connect donators.java with client.java, and in donators.java put:

if ( playerRights == //rankid ) {
// your main file sql connector
// also your content
}

OR

You don’t even have to use the web to do this, just make their rights rank 4 or 5, and in client.java put:

if ( playerRights == //rankid ) {
addItem(item, amount);
sendMessage("hi");
}

Put it in the right place, such as a login value of 0, or uhhh, if they click a certain NPC:

if ( NPCID == 1 // Hans ) {
if ( playerRights == //rankid ) {
addItem(id, amount);
sendMessage("You've been given a set of shit");
} else {
sendMessage("You aren't a donator");
}
}

Read full topic
